Description: Combine fire and electricity to create a spark of plasma.
Summon a flame charged with electricity, shocking on contact.
Unleash a strike of fire and lightning on a single target.
Launch a bolt of plasma energy, burning and electrocuting targets.
Release a surge of fire and electricity, arcing between enemies.
Cause a shockwave of fire and electricity to explode outward.
Create a storm of fire and lightning that strikes multiple targets.
Call down a blazing thunderbolt, setting fire to the area it strikes.
Surround yourself with an aura of plasma, burning and electrocuting attackers.
Emit a burst of static fire that ignites and shocks all nearby.
Create an inferno charged with lightning, increasing its destructive power.
Send a wave of flame and lightning rolling across the battlefield.
Summon a storm of firebolts charged with electricity.
Launch embers charged with electricity to ignite and shock targets.
Cause an explosion of plasma fire that incinerates and shocks all within range.
Create a wall of flames charged with electricity, burning and shocking anything that touches it.
Summon a massive storm of fire and lightning that rains destruction.
Release a burst of plasma flames that devastate all in their path.
Call upon divine flames and lightning to obliterate everything in a massive radius.
Unleash the ultimate combination of fire and lightning, destroying everything in an immense area.
